resources.comment: Base URL of where NuGet packages are stored, in the format http://localhost:65370/v3-flatcontainer/{id-lower}/{version-lower}/{id-lower}.{version-lower}.nupkg
Base URL of Azure storage where NuGet package registration info is stored
Base URL of Azure storage where NuGet package registration info is stored in GZIP format. This base URL does not include SemVer 2.0.0 packages.
Base URL of Azure storage where NuGet package registration info is stored in GZIP format. This base URL includes SemVer 2.0.0 packages.
Query endpoint of NuGet Search service (primary)
